coded_answer.p: I am writing to let you know about the disappointeddisappointing evening I had seenseeing your show with the worst services I have ever seenexperienced.

First of all, inon the ticket for entrance it says that the actor was Danny Brook and realyreally he was not. In the show apearsappears a different actorA different actor appears in the show, so I was very disappointed.

Then, inon the ticket it says that the show startedstarts at 19.30 and, I don't know why, it started at 20:15, very unpolitedimpolite ofon your sidepart, and, also, you make me lose timewasted my time.
OtherThe other thing is that inon the ticket it apearsappears that discounts were available but when I asked forabout it, there waswere no onenone.
The last thing is that you invited us to visit your restaurant after the show, but it was closed because the food was not alreadyyet done.

I thought you were a good theatre, werewhere people can go and have a good evening alone or with somebody else, but realyreally I am very disappointed and I want to ask for my money back. I'll never return again because of the bad service you oferoffer.
Please, let me know your answer.
